member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent.GetRequiredProtections
member.summary: Gets the content protections that must be applied in frame-server mode.
member.param: Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent.SetApplicationCertificate
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the certificate in X.509 format, followed by the application identifier signed with a SHA-256 signature using the private key from the certificate.
The size of the pbBlob buffer, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent.SetContentProtectionManager
member.param: A pointer to the interface, implemented by the caller.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent.SetOPMWindow
member.summary: Specifies the window that should receive output link protections.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent.ShareResources
member.summary: Enables the Media Engine to access protected content while in frame-server mode.
member.param: A pointer to the Direct3D 11 device content. The Media Engine queries this pointer for the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent.TransferVideoFrame
member.summary: Copies a protected video frame to a DXGI surface.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the destination surface.
A pointer to an structure that specifies the source rectangle.
A pointer to a structure that specifies the destination rectangle.
A pointer to an structure that specifies the border color.
Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration. These flags indicate which content protections the application must apply before presenting the surface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineProtectedContent
member.summary: Enables the Media Engine to play protected video content.
